name: Caterham Collect
description:
Keyboard  ✓
Gamepad  ✓

Windows - OK
Linux - Not Tested

Could you be the fastest to collect gas cans ?

Drive as fast as possible and collect gas cans with your keyboard or your gamepad.

Controls :

Keyboard Gamepad Description Arrow Left Joystick Turn your wheels. Arrow Left and Right Trigger Accelerate and decelerate. X A Handbrake. Spacebar B Change camera. R Right Shoulder Reset car to nearest checkpoint.
